channel.title: Linux Reader
channel.description: Welcome! Check out super awesome Linux stuff: Ansible Bash Scripting Containers Desktop Keyboard Networking RedHat Tools Bashes Boots Cyber Securities Files Packages Storages Systems Users and Groups Virtualizations Also check out what I am doing now, read my book notes, contact me, or see what this site is all about
